channel.title: Telecom Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Telecom Industry on FinanClub

item.title: DISH
item.description: score:771 Chances: Charlie Ergen is nearing a deal to merge Dish Network and EchoStar for a nationwide wireless network. DISH Network partners with Amazon to sell Boost Infinite wireless plans to Prime members. Risks: Uncertainties related to the successful completion of the merger between Dish Network and EchoStar.

item.title: HPE
item.description: score:1112 Chances: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) announces a transition plan for CFO Tarek Robbiati, who will assume an external CEO role. HPE expands its Bare Metal Cloud platform with cloud-native HPE ProLiant RL300 Gen11 servers, enhancing AI inferencing and cloud-native workloads. ZoomInfo delivered positive earnings and revenue surprises for Q2 2023, potentially impacting HPE’s stock and market sentiment.
